biotools.summary:
Grow lineages along minimum spanning tree for b cell receptor sequencing data.

This algorithm is developed to reconstruct lineage tree from subset of tree nodes.

Grow Lineages along Minimum Spanning Tree for B Cell Recptor Seqeuence Data.

GLaMST can be downloaded from https://github.com/xysheep/GLaMST/releases.
